thread.title: Essential Properties Announces First Quarter 2025 Results | EPRT Stock News
thread.title_full: Essential Properties Announces First Quarter 2025 Results | EPRT Stock News

author: @gurufocus
title: Essential Properties Announces First Quarter 2025 Results | EPRT Stock News
text:
- Essential Properties Realty Trust, Inc. (
EPRT,Financial) reports first-quarter 2025 net income per share of $0.29 and AFFO per share of $0.45. - The company completed investments worth $307.7 million with a weighted average cash cap rate of 7.8%.
- Essential Properties reiterates 2025 AFFO guidance of $1.85 to $1.89 per share.
Essential Properties Realty Trust, Inc. (EPRT) has announced its financial results for the first quarter of 2025, showcasing a net income per share of $0.29, marking a 4% increase from the previous year. The adjusted funds from operations (AFFO) per share also saw a 7% rise, reaching $0.45.
During the first quarter, the company completed investments amounting to $307.7 million across 48 properties with a weighted average cash cap rate of 7.8%. In contrast, dispositions included 11 properties, yielding net proceeds of $24.3 million at a 6.9% weighted average cash cap rate.
Essential Properties has reiterated its guidance for the full year 2025, expecting AFFO per share to fall within the range of $1.85 to $1.89. The guidance incorporates an anticipated investment volume ranging from $900 million to $1.1 billion.
The liquidity position remains robust with $47.0 million in cash and cash equivalents and total available liquidity of $1.5 billion, which includes an unused revolving credit facility capacity of $1.0 billion.
The company also declared a quarterly dividend of $0.295 per share for the first quarter of 2025, translating into an annualized dividend of $1.18 per share. This dividend was paid out on April 11, 2025, to stockholders of record as of March 31, 2025.
